TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataBindingCollectionConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Use of this type is not recommended because DataBindings editing is launched via a DesignerActionList instead of the property grid. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")

Docs.summary: Provides a type converter for objects.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This type converter calls the base <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertTo%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method for all destination types except <xref:System.String>, for which an empty string ("") is returned.
## Examples [!code-cpp[DataSourceTypeConverterExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataSourceTypeConverterExamples/CPP/datasourcetypeconverterexamples.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DataSourceTypeConverterExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataSourceTypeConverterExamples/CS/datasourcetypeconverterexamples.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataSourceTypeConverterExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataSourceTypeConverterExamples/VB/datasourcetypeconverterexamples.vb#1)]

Docs.summary: Initializes an instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public override object ConvertTo (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture, object value, Type destinationType);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance object ConvertTo(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, class System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture, object value, class System.Type destinationType) cil managed

Docs.param: An that indicates the component or control to which the data binding collection belongs.
A that can be used to provide additional culture information.
Docs.summary: Converts a data binding collection to the specified type.
Docs.returns: The object produced by the type conversion. If the parameter is of type , this method returns an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method returns an empty string if the `destinationType` parameter is of type <xref:System.String>. Otherwise this method calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.ConvertTo%2A> method of the base <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> class.
